data.event: The Bergen area was opened up in 1801 when a road was hacked through the thick "Northwoods" (In its early days of settlement, Bergen was called Northwoods.) from LeRoy to Lake Ontario.

event.title: was hacked through the thick "Northwoods" (In its early days

data.event: The Bergen area was opened up in 1801 when a road was hacked through the thick "Northwoods" (In its early days of settlement, Bergen was called Northwoods.) from LeRoy to Lake Ontario.
Bergen was first settled in 1801 by Samuel Lincoln.
The first church organization was established in December 1807.
The Congregational church was founded January 25, 1808.
The first inn was opened in 1809 by Samuel Butler.
